name: federation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 [ C ] a group of organizations, countries, regions, etc. that have joined together to form a larger organization or government: the Russian federation
[ U ] the act of forming a federation: The federation of the six original Australian states took place in 1901. He's against European federation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe trade federation promotes cooperation between local businesses.The chairmen are proposing that a federation of the two leagues should take place.The organization was formed in 1982 by the federation of three separate firms.Opponents argue that European federation shifts power away from nation states.A federation of charities have launched a new campaign against heart disease.
